name: Barcode
summary: Simple barcode helpers with fluent and static APIs.
remarks: Use to pick the output format by file extension.

methods.name: Create
methods.summary: Starts a fluent barcode builder.

methods.name: Encode
methods.summary: Encodes a 1D barcode.

methods.name: Png
methods.summary: Renders a barcode as PNG.
